snippet: Ron Paul’s ability to draw young voters, first-time voters, and independents to the Republican Party, key demographics to the general election, will make criticizing him a delicate task.
abstract: Republicans alarmed by Rep Ron Paul's strong performance at the Iowa caucuses will have to tread especially carefully in light of his growing appeal among young voters; observers say Paul could mount strong independent bid should he fail to gain the Republican nomination.
lead_paragraph: Ron Paul’s ability to draw young voters, first-time voters, and independents to the Republican Party, key demographics to the general election, will make criticizing him a delicate task.

headline.main: A Bit of a Balancing Act for Republicans Critical of Paul
headline.print_headline: A Bit of a Balancing Act for Republicans Critical of Paul
